name: Collision Course (itch) (jacobgreendev)
description:
The enemy pilot has been eliminated - you will take his place. Take control and do what must be done to ensure this ship does not reach its destination. Remember: their worker droids will attempt to repair any damage you inflict. Make them regret it.

A/D: Steer Ship
S: Turn Around
LMB: Fire
R: Reload

Note: If you have issues with lag on Chrome, try another browser such as Opera, Firefox, or Edge.
